text:
LENDIX| Data Scientist | Amsterdam (NL) | Full-Time | lendix.com

Lendix is reinventing the way SMEs get financed in Europe, using cutting edge technologies. you will be our first employee 100% dedicated to Data. We are looking for a highly technical, hands-on and mission-driven Data Scientist in charge of building an advanced data model on which all the company will rely.

more info: https://lendix.bamboohr.co.uk/jobs/view.php?id=72
